parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Parent ID is assigned upon registration in successful authentication for all requests

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system, which is identity care permission to access openplatform, expires in 2 hours

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated dynamically as follows:sha1(session_id + access_token + time_stamp + secret_key), if your parameters are incorrect, it will be prompting parameter error

response_fields.name: msg
response_fields.description: The state of the item in the receiving

response_fields.name: msg_id
response_fields.description: The serial number of the item

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: Name of the item in your language

response_fields.name: total_price
response_fields.description: The total price rate representing the currency unit rate of the item

response_fields.name: country_price
response_fields.description: The current price of the item in the listing percentage - shows your price based on percentage

response_fields.name: original_price
response_fields.description: The original price of the item in the listing
